abstract: Irving H. Picard, the bankruptcy trustee, accuses the Swiss bank and “feeder fund” affiliates of helping enable Bernard L. Madoff’s huge Ponzi scheme and reaping $80 million in fees.
snippet: Irving H. Picard, the bankruptcy trustee, accuses the Swiss bank and “feeder fund” affiliates of helping enable Bernard L. Madoff’s huge Ponzi scheme and reaping $80 million in fees.
lead_paragraph: 7:11 p.m. | Updated  The trustee charged with trying to recover money for the victims of Bernard L. Madoff’s huge Ponzi scheme sued the Swiss bank UBS and its affiliates on Wednesday, accusing it of enabling the fraud.

headline.main: Madoff Trustee Sues UBS to Recover $2 Billion
